72 NEW: Alan Dershowitz *GOES OFF* on Letitia James and Alvin Bragg over cases against TRUMP🚨 posted 6 hours ago by kinbergfan 1 comments award share report block Jason Cohen 🇺🇸 @JasonJournoDC • 17h 🚨NEW: Alan Dershowitz *GOES OFF* on Letitia James and Alvin Bragg over cases against TRUMP🚨 "Tish James ran for office — the only time I've ever heard a prosecutor do this since Stalin's time — on the claim of 'I'm gonna get Trump!'" "And she tried to get him in every way!
